Rulings.Edison:
●The ●This effect targets 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.
●When a monster selected for Amazoness Blowpiper's effect is flipped face-down, the effect is reset.
●After selecting a monster with Amazoness Blowpiper's effect, if Amazoness Blowpiper is flipped face-down or removed from the field, its effect still applies until the end of the turn.
Rulings.Tengu:
(1) Select 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field during each of your Standby Phases. Decrease the ATK of the selected monster by 500 points until the end of this turn.
●The (1) mandatory Trigger Effect activates & resolves on the field.
●This effect targets 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.

Rulings.Goat:
●When a monster selected for Amazoness Blowpiper's effect is Set, the effect is reset.
●After selecting a monster with Amazoness Blowpiper's effect, if Amazoness Blowpiper is Set or removed from the field, its effect still applies until the end of the turn.
●“Amazoness Blowpiper” may only target a face up card.
●Q: Can “Amazoness Blowpiper’s” effect be used more than once per turn? 
A: As per the card text, it says you use the effect once during each of your Standby phases. That is the only time the effect is used.
